channel.title: Need help with my client
channel.description: I got my server up and running, how do i give it to other people? i tried copying and putting the client in a new folder and it didnt work:/ can anybody help me please

item.title: Need help with my client
item.dc:creator: @terby terby
item.description:
@terby wrote:

[quote=“Nebulae, post:4, topic:459993”]You should have a field in the main method called server =, setup an IP via http://www.no-ip.org/, download the dynamic update client and replace the current IP with your servername.no-ip.biz (or whatever you chose to use). That is how other players connect to your server.

http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,342685.0.html for more information.[/quote]

do you have skype to help me with? if you do add me curtis.fox24

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with my client
item.dc:creator: @Nebulae Nebulae
item.description:
@Nebulae wrote:

You should have a field in the main method called server =, setup an IP via http://www.no-ip.org/, download the dynamic update client and replace the current IP with your servername.no-ip.biz (or whatever you chose to use). That is how other players connect to your server.

http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,342685.0.html for more information.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with my client
item.dc:creator: @terby terby
item.description:
@terby wrote:

[quote=“Nebulae, post:2, topic:459993”]http://www.rarlab.com/download.htm

Assuming you have WinRAR, you need to archive the client folder (right click, add to archive). Then go to http://www.uppit.com/ and upload the client, then share the link with other people.

Make sure you have the correct IP set in your client for outside connections to connect to before uploading.[/quote]
how do i setup the ip correctly?

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with my client
item.dc:creator: @Nebulae Nebulae
item.description:
@Nebulae wrote:

http://www.rarlab.com/download.htm

Assuming you have WinRAR, you need to archive the client folder (right click, add to archive). Then go to http://www.uppit.com/ and upload the client, then share the link with other people.

Make sure you have the correct IP set in your client for outside connections to connect to before uploading.

Read full topic
